title: Best Bisexual Erotica
description: In the tradition of other best-selling "Best Of" series, BEST BISEXUAL EROTICA combines the cream of the previously published crop with all-new stories with a bi flavored tingle. Co-editors Carol Queen and Bill Brent have selecteed twenty-two stories for straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, and fetish audiences -- in short, anyone literate with a libido. The first book of erotica to originate in the bisexual community!
author: Bill Brent
